kNoMoreQuests
I've no more information on hidden treasure, but I'll dig up something eventually!
Je n'ai pas plus d'informations sur le trésor caché, mais je vais déterrer quelque chose finalement!
Ich habe nicht mehr Informationen über verborgene Schatz, aber ich werde graben etwas später!
Non ho nessuna ulteriore informazione sul tesoro nascosto, ma tirerò qualcosa alla fine!
No tengo ninguna información más sobre un tesoro escondido, pero voy a desenterrar algo con el tiempo!

kGreeting1
Greetings, I've got some clues for you today if you are looking to find some rare treasures hidden around the Keep.
Salutations, j'ai quelques indices pour vous aujourd'hui si vous êtes à la recherche pour trouver des trésors cachés rares autour de la Gardez.
Grüße, ich habe einige Hinweise für Sie heute, wenn Sie schauen, um einige seltene Schätze rund um den Halten versteckt zu finden sind.
Saluti, ho alcuni indizi per voi oggi, se si sta cercando di trovare alcuni rari tesori nascosti intorno alla Fortezza.
Saludos, tengo algunas pistas para el día de hoy si usted está buscando para encontrar algunos tesoros raros escondidos en la Torre del Homenaje.
Greetings, I've got some clues for you today if you are looking to find some rare treasures hidden around the Keep.

kGreeting2
Greetings young adventurer! I am in need of 10 Boar's Livers. You can find them .... wait, where am I now?
Salutations jeune aventurier! Je suis dans le besoin de foies de sanglier 10. Vous pouvez les trouver .... attendre, où suis-je maintenant?
Grüße junge Abenteurer! Ich bin in der Notwendigkeit des Ebers 10 Lebern. Sie finden sie .... warten, wo bin ich jetzt?
Saluti giovane avventuriero! Ho bisogno di Livers 10 cinghiale. Li potete trovare .... aspetta, dove sono ora?
Joven aventurero Saludos! Estoy en la necesidad de los hígados de 10 jabalí. Usted puede encontrar .... momento, ¿dónde estoy ahora?
Greetings young adventurer! I am in need of 10 Boar's Livers. You can find them .... wait, where am I now?

kQuestText_Quest1_Leg1_Message1
You are truly Royalty.\nPlease visit the throne room!
Vous êtes vraiment de droits.\nS'il vous plaît visitez la salle du trône!
Sie sind wirklich Königshaus.\nBitte besuchen Sie den Thronsaal!
Siete veramente Royalty.\nSi prega di visitare la sala del trono!
Ustedes son verdaderamente derechos.\nPor favor, visite la sala del trono!
You are truly Royalty.\nPlease visit the throne room!
You are truly Royalty.\nPlease visit the throne room!
You are truly Royalty.\nPlease visit the throne room!

kQuestText_Quest1_Leg1_Message2

Congratulations!

Thank you for becoming the proud owner of your very own Keep!
For purchasing this space within the first 30 days of its release you have been rewarded with two EXCLUSIVE items:

The Royal Crystal Crowns.

Félicitations!

Je vous remercie pour devenir l'heureux propriétaire de votre propre Gardez!
Pour l'achat de cet espace dans les 30 premiers jours de sa sortie que vous avez été récompensé par deux articles EXCLUSIVES:

Couronnes Royales de Cristal.

Herzlichen Glückwunsch!

Danke für das Werden der stolze Besitzer Ihres eigenen Halten!
Für den Kauf dieses Raumes innerhalb der ersten 30 Tagen nach der Freigabe haben Sie mit zwei exklusive Gegenstände belohnt worden:

Königliche Kristall-Kronen.

Congratulazioni!

Grazie per diventare l'orgoglioso proprietario del vostro molto proprio Tenere!
Per l'acquisto di questo spazio entro i primi 30 giorni dalla sua release sono stati premiati con due elementi ESCLUSIVI:

Royal Crystal Corone.

¡Felicitaciones!

Gracias por convertirse en el orgulloso propietario de su propio Mantenga!
ara la compra de este espacio dentro de los primeros 30 días de su lanzamiento ha sido premiado con dos objetos exclusivos:

Royal Crystal Coronas.

Congratulations!

Thank you for becoming the proud owner of your very own Keep!
For purchasing this space within the first 30 days of its release you have been rewarded with two EXCLUSIVE items:

The Royal Crystal Crowns.

kQuestText_Quest1_Leg1_Message3

These crowns are made from the precious Avalon
Crystals that keep your island aloft.

Thank you again and please enjoy your
exclusive rewards!
Ces couronnes sont faites à partir des cristaux précieux Avalon Cela garder votre île en altitude.\n\nMerci encore et s'il vous plaît profiter de vos avantages exclusifs!
Diese Kronen sind von den kostbaren Avalon-Kristallen, die Ihre Insel empor.\n\nVielen Dank noch einmal und genießen Sie bitte Ihre exklusiven Belohnungen!
Queste corone sono realizzati con i preziosi cristalli Avalon che mantengono la vostra isola in alto.\n\nGrazie ancora e vi prego di godervi i vostri premi esclusivi!
Estas coronas se hacen de los preciosos cristales de Avalon que mantener a su isla en alto.\n\nGracias de nuevo y por favor, disfrutar de sus ventajas exclusivas!

exclusive rewards!

kQuestText_Quest2_Leg1_Message1

Gargoyles were created to guard the buildings they were placed upon, but they have always had a lot of superstition surrounding them for being creatures of the dark... Could this be true? Check in the darkest corner of your Keep to find yourself a stone guardian.

Gargouilles ont été créés pour protéger les bâtiments qu'ils ont été placés sur, mais ils ont toujours eu beaucoup de superstition qui les entoure pour être des créatures de l'obscurité ... Serait-ce vrai? Vérifiez dans le coin le plus sombre de votre Gardez de vous trouver un gardien de pierre.

Gargoyles geschaffen wurden, um die Gebäude auf sie gelegt wurden bewachen, aber sie hatten immer eine Menge Aberglauben rund um sie, weil sie Geschöpfe der Dunkelheit ... Konnte das wahr sein? Überprüfen Sie in der dunkelsten Ecke Ihres Halten Sie zu finden, selbst einen Stein Vormund.

Gargoyles sono stati creati per proteggere gli edifici era stato vincolato al momento, ma hanno sempre avuto un sacco di superstizioni che li circonda per essere creature del buio ... Questo potrebbe essere vero? Controlla nell'angolo più buio della vostra Tenere per trovare te stesso un guardiano di pietra.

Las gárgolas fueron creadas para proteger los edificios que fueron colocados sobre, pero que siempre han tenido una gran cantidad de supersticiones que les rodea por ser criaturas de la oscuridad ... ¿Podría esto ser cierto? Compruebe en el rincón más oscuro de su Mantenga encontrarte a ti mismo un guardián de piedra.

Gargoyles were created to guard the buildings they were placed upon, but they have always had a lot of superstition surrounding them for being creatures of the dark... Could this be true? Check in the darkest corner of your Keep to find yourself a stone guardian.

Gargoyles were created to guard the buildings they were placed upon, but they have always had a lot of superstition surrounding them for being creatures of the dark... Could this be true? Check in the darkest corner of your Keep to find yourself a stone guardian.

Congratulations!\n\nYou've found the Gargoyle Statue!
Félicitations!\n\nVous avez trouvé la statue de gargouille!
Herzlichen Glückwunsch!\n\nSie haben den Gargoyle Statue gefunden!
Congratulazioni!\n\nAvete trovato la Statua Gargoyle!
¡Felicitaciones!\n\nUsted ha encontrado la estatua de gárgola!

kQuestText_Quest3_Leg1_Message1
Satyr's have been known to play near water. Check out your pond to find a reward honoring the playful satyr!
Satyre ont été connus pour jouer près de l'eau. Vérifiez votre étang pour trouver une récompense ludique honorer le satyre!
Satyr sono stati bekannt, in der Nähe von Wasser spielen. Schauen Sie sich Ihren Teich zu einem spielerischen Belohnung zu Ehren des Satyr finden!
Satiro sono stati conosciuti per giocare vicino all'acqua. Controlla il tuo laghetto per trovare una ricompensa giocoso in onore del satiro!
Sátiro se han conocido para jugar cerca del agua. Echa un vistazo a su estanque para encontrar una recompensa lúdica en honor a la sátiro!
Satyr's have been known to play near water. Check out your pond to find a reward honoring the playful satyr!

kQuestText_Quest4_Leg1_Message1
Wizards are masters of time and space. The next reward could be anywhere! Find the reward to pay homage to the noble wizard.
Les assistants sont maîtres du temps et l'espace. La prochaine récompense pourrait être n'importe où! Trouver la récompense pour rendre hommage à l'assistant noble.
Die Zauberer sind Meister der Zeit und Raum. Die nächste Belohnung könnte überall sein! Finden Sie die Belohnung, eine Hommage an die edle Assistenten zu bezahlen.
Wizards sono maestri del tempo e dello spazio. Il premio successivo potrebbe essere ovunque! Trova il premio per rendere omaggio alla procedura guidata nobile.
Los asistentes son maestros de tiempo y espacio. La recompensa próximo podría ser en cualquier lugar! Buscar la recompensa para rendir homenaje a la noble asistente.
Wizards are masters of time and space. The next reward could be anywhere! Find the reward to pay homage to the noble wizard.

kQuestText_Quest5_Leg1_Message1
Cherubs fly around spreading joy and love. Check high up places for a reward that captures the cherub's whimsy.
Chérubins volent autour de répandre la joie et l'amour. Vérifiez les endroits en haut pour une récompense qui capte la fantaisie de chérubin.
Engelchen fliegen herum verbreiten Freude und Liebe. Überprüfen Sie hoch oben Orte für eine Belohnung, die dem Cherub der Spleen einfängt.
Cherubini volare intorno diffondere la gioia e l'amore. Controllare posti in alto per una ricompensa che cattura la fantasia cherubino.
Querubines volar alrededor de difusión de la alegría y el amor. Compruebe los lugares altos hasta para una recompensa que captura la fantasía querubín.
Cherubs fly around spreading joy and love. Check high up places for a reward that captures the cherub's whimsy.

kQuestText_Quest6_Leg1_Message1
In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.
Afin de trouver les clés du Donjon, tout d'abord, je voudrais vérifier autour de l'île, sa possible que l'un des gardiens les ont perdus. J'aimerais commencer quelque part en haut.
Um die Schlüssel zum Dungeon zu finden, zuerst würde ich um die Insel zu überprüfen, ist es möglich, dass einer der Wachen sie verloren. Ich würde beginnen irgendwo hoch oben.

Al fine di trovare le chiavi del Dungeon, in primo luogo vorrei controllare il giro dell'isola, la sua possibile che una delle guardie loro hanno perso. Mi piacerebbe cominciare da qualche parte in alto.
Con el fin de encontrar las claves de la mazmorra, en primer lugar me gustaría comprobar alrededor de la isla, es posible que uno de los guardias perdido. Me gustaría empezar por algún sitio alto.
In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.
In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.
In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.
In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.

In order to find the keys to the Dungeon, first I would check around the island, its possible that one of the guards lost them. I'd start somewhere high up.
kQuestText_Quest6_Leg2_Message1
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
Si ils ne sont pas ici, alors je voudrais jeter un oeil quelque part hors des sentiers battus. Peut-être quelque chose sur l'île principale.
Wenn sie nicht hier sind, dann würde ich einen Blick irgendwo treffen abseits der ausgetretenen Pfade. Vielleicht etwas abseits der Hauptinsel.
Se non sono qui, quindi vorrei dare un'occhiata da qualche parte fuori dai sentieri battuti. Forse qualcosa al largo dell'isola principale.
Si no están aquí, entonces me gustaría echar un vistazo en algún lugar de la ruta marcada. Tal vez algo de la isla principal.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
If they're not up here, then I would take a look somewhere off the beaten path. Perhaps something off the main island.
kQuestText_Quest6_Leg3_Message1
Not here either? How about underneath the main island? Perhaps it fell down a crevice.
Pas ici non? Que diriez-dessous de l'île principale? Peut-être il est tombé une crevasse.
Auch hier nicht? Wie wäre es unter der Hauptinsel? Vielleicht ist es fiel eine Felsspalte.
Non neppure qui? Come circa sotto l'isola principale? Forse è caduto in un crepaccio.
Ni aquí tampoco? ¿Y por debajo de la isla principal? Tal vez se cayó una grieta.
Not here either? How about underneath the main island? Perhaps it fell down a crevice.
Not here either? How about underneath the main island? Perhaps it fell down a crevice.
Not here either? How about underneath the main island? Perhaps it fell down a crevice.
Not here either? How about underneath the main island? Perhaps it fell down a crevice.

kQuestText_Quest6_Leg4_Message1
No? Darn. I guess that means one of the guards has it. Who knows why they haven't handed it to Matthew yet, though. The only way to be sure is to talk to each of them. One of them must have it.

Non? Darn. Je suppose que cela signifie que l'un des gardes dont il dispose. Qui sait pourquoi ils ne l'ont pas remis à Matthew, cependant. La seule façon d'être sûr est de parler à chacun d'eux. L'un d'eux doit avoir.

Nein? Darn. Ich denke, das bedeutet, eine der Wachen hat. Wer weiß, warum sie es nicht Matthäus überliefert noch, though. Der einzige Weg, um sicherzustellen, ist es für jeden von ihnen zu sprechen. Einer von ihnen ist es haben.

No? Darn. Temo che questo significhi una delle guardie che ha. Chissà perché non l'hanno consegnato a Matteo ancora, però. L'unico modo per essere sicuri è quello di parlare a ciascuno di essi. Uno di loro deve avere.

No? Darn. Supongo que eso significa que uno de los guardias que tiene. Quién sabe por qué no lo han entregado a Mateo todavía, aunque. La única manera de estar seguro es de hablar con cada uno de ellos. Uno de ellos debe tenerlo.
No? Darn. I guess that means one of the guards has it. Who knows why they haven't handed it to Matthew yet, though. The only way to be sure is to talk to each of them. One of them must have it.
No? Darn. I guess that means one of the guards has it. Who knows why they haven't handed it to Matthew yet, though. The only way to be sure is to talk to each of them. One of them must have it.
No? Darn. I guess that means one of the guards has it. Who knows why they haven't handed it to Matthew yet, though. The only way to be sure is to talk to each of them. One of them must have it.

Félicitations!\n\nVous avez reçu les clés de la Dungeon!
Herzlichen Glückwunsch!\n\nSie haben den Schlüssel zum Dungeon erhalten!
Congratulazioni!\n\nHai ricevuto le chiavi del Dungeon!
¡Felicitaciones!\n\nUsted ha recibido las llaves del calabozo!

kPleaseReturnToGisele
Please return to Gisele to see if she has any\nmore scavenger hunts for you!
S'il vous plaît revenir à Gisèle pour voir si elle a des chasses au trésor, pas plus pour vous!
Bitte zurücksenden an Gisele zu sehen, wenn sie nicht mehr Schnitzeljagden für Sie hat!
Si prega di tornare a Gisele per vedere se ha cacce al tesoro più per voi!
Por favor vuelva a Gisele para ver si ella tiene alguna más búsquedas del tesoro para usted!

kChat_Greeting1a
Good day, milord. Fancy a hunt for some treasures here on your island?
Bonne journée, milord. Envie d'une chasse aux trésors pour certains ici sur votre île?
Guten Tag, milord. Lust auf ein Jagd nach einigen Schätze hier auf der Insel?
Buon giorno, milord. Voglia di un caccia per alcuni tesori qui sulla tua isola?
Buenos días, milord. ¿Te apetece una cacería de algunos tesoros aquí en la isla?

kChat_Unavailable1a
My apologies, milord. I have no more treasure hunts for you at this time.
Toutes mes excuses, milord. Je n'ai pas d'autres chasses au trésor pour vous en ce moment.
Ich entschuldige mich, milord. Ich habe nicht mehr Schatzsuche für Sie zu diesem Zeitpunkt.
Le mie scuse, milord. Non ho niente più cacce al tesoro per voi in questo momento.
Mis disculpas, milord. No tengo más cazas del tesoro para usted en este momento.

kChat_CantTurnIn1a
Sorry milord, but you can't turn in this treasure hunt here. The next destination on the hunt will take you where you need to go.
Milord Désolé, mais vous ne pouvez pas tourner dans cette chasse au trésor ici. La prochaine destination sur la chasse vous emmener là où vous devez aller.
Leider milord, aber man kann nicht in dieser Schatzsuche hier drehen. Das nächste Ziel auf der Jagd wird dich führen, wohin Sie gehen müssen.
Milord Ci dispiace, ma non si può girare in questa caccia al tesoro qui. La prossima destinazione a caccia vi porterà dove dovete andare.
Milord Lo sentimos, pero no se puede convertir en esta búsqueda del tesoro aquí. El siguiente destino en la búsqueda te llevará a donde usted necesita ir.
Sorry milord, but you can't turn in this treasure hunt here. The next destination on the hunt will take you where you need to go.

kChat_NotComplete1a
Sorry milord, but this scavenger hunt is not yet complete. Return to me once it is. I can tell you the last hint, if you'd like.
Milord Désolé, cette chasse au trésor n'est pas encore terminée. Revenez me voir une fois qu'il est. Je ne peux vous dire le dernier conseil, si vous le souhaitez.
Leider milord, aber diese Schnitzeljagd ist noch nicht abgeschlossen. Kehrt zu mir zurück, sobald es ist. Ich kann Ihnen sagen, die letzte Spur, wenn Sie möchten.
Milord Siamo spiacenti, ma questa caccia al tesoro non è ancora completa. Ritornate a me una volta che è. Posso dirvi l'ultimo consiglio, se lo desideri.
Milord Lo sentimos, pero este juego de búsqueda aún no ha concluido. Vuelve a mí una vez que es. Yo puedo decir que el último mensaje de ayuda, si quieres.
